entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
